name: collectorCrab
description:
For WEEKLY GAME JAM 162

move the Crab. collects the cans. don't touch black crabs. grab shrimps for extra health. 

try the android one if possible. 

webGL not tested on mobile. 

Also forgive me for that loud "new high score" text. I didn't use version control and its a drag to build again and again for little stuff.
